title: Return Policy
content: No Questions Asked Return Policy: If you are dissatisfied with any item, you can return it to the delivery man at the door for a full refund.

perishables.title: Perishables (Fish, Meat, Vegetables)
perishables.rule: Must be reported within 24 hours if issues are found after delivery.

non_perishables.title: Non-Perishables (Packaged Goods)
non_perishables.rule: Can be returned within 7 days if unopened.

methods: Use 'Issue Report' button in Order History tab

title: Refund Policy
content: Refunds are processed based on your payment method.

cash_on_delivery.title: Cash on Delivery
cash_on_delivery.rule: Amount is deducted from the total bill immediately

online_payment.title: Online Payment (bKash/Card)
online_payment.rule: Refunds are processed within 5-7 working days to the original payment method

chaldal_balance.title: Chaldal Account Balance
chaldal_balance.rule: Refunds can be instantly credited to your Chaldal Egg account for future purchases

title: Delivery Information
content: We deliver in 1-hour windows from 8:00 AM to 10:00 PM.

express_delivery.title: Express Delivery
express_delivery.rule: Available in select areas (delivery in 1 hour)

delivery_charges.title: Delivery Charges
delivery_charges.rule: Free for orders over ৳400 (standard offer, may vary)

title: Customer Support
content: Multiple ways to reach us for any assistance.

title: Payment Methods
content: We accept multiple payment methods for your convenience.

cash_on_delivery.title: Cash on Delivery

bkash.title: bKash

title: Order Tracking
content: Track your order in real-time through our app.

title: Frequently Asked Questions
content: Common questions and answers about our service.

minimum_order.question: Is there a minimum order amount?
minimum_order.answer: No minimum order amount. However, orders below ৳400 may have delivery charges.

delivery_areas.question: Which areas do you deliver to?
delivery_areas.answer: We deliver across Dhaka, Chittagong, and other major cities. Check availability in the app.

product_quality.question: How do you ensure product quality?
product_quality.answer: We maintain strict quality control and offer a no-questions-asked return policy.

order_cancellation.question: Can I cancel my order?
order_cancellation.answer: Yes, you can cancel before the order is out for delivery. Contact 16716 or use the app.
